Articles.Content:
Hi all,

With the upcoming release of KSP version 1.0 and procedural fairings I thought it would be pertinent to make and release one last hurrah for lovers of stock fairings.

So here I have made a mini Atlas V 541 launcher and satellite. Complete with an over the top, part count be damned stock faring. I have really enjoyed making small fairings out of cubics and backwards solar panels.

I even don't think many others made these either so they are a rarity and I personally hope they live on even after the 1.0 release.

The Atlas V itself is a very accurate replica complete with 'off center' boosters and a detailed Centaur second stage.

It is capable of placing the payload into a 190,000m orbit with fuel spare to de-orbit the Centaur.

Weighing in at 620 parts its not for the faint of CPU but this kind of detail comes with a price doesn't it.

Enough talk! Pictures!

There she is. A deceptively simple silhouette houses a detailed and honest heart.

Thank you for looking

MJ

DOWNLOAD
